meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the June 17, 2024 Special Called City Plan Commission ForwardDallas Meeting, the July 25, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing, the August 8, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing, the August 22, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing, and the September 5, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: Zoning cases that are under advisement from previous meetings.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Individual
agenda_items.description: Individual zoning cases requiring separate consideration.

agenda_items.title: Development Code Amendments - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: Consideration of amending Chapters 51 and 51A of the Dallas Development Code.

agenda_items.title: Special Provision Sign District - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: Application to create 'The Frontier Subdistrict' within the Downtown Special Provision Sign District.

agenda_items.title: Landmark Appeal
